title: Lux
body: Why do people play this champion. This champion is literally garbage with shit passive. She is simply outclassed by all mid champs and supporter champs. IF u are a Egirl and wanna look pretty, get plastic surgery in real life . And dont tell me lux carried this game and that game. It is not becuz u guys won game becuz of lux, and if others champs there, game ended much quicker and effective manner. Seriously rework her or delete the champs entirely.,

replies.body:
Not sure if you're tolling, or just cant play one of the most basic champs?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

Lux is the champ I play when I'm too tired or unmotivated to try. 
Because literally all you do is sit back, wayyyyy out of anyone's range, and poke them till they recall, _(or till you land your Q and just 1 hit them with your full combo.)_ No effort required at all. Not to mention that the AoE of poking them, also gives you a free last hit on all the minions in a wave with your passive. So unlike many mid laners, you can constantly poke without sacrificing farm.

You struggle against champs like Zed or Yasuo of course, and you should, because they are assassins and you're an immobile squishy mage, thats just the food chain. But against other mages, she out-ranges and out-bursts the vast majority of them.

Late game, even if you had no idea what to do _(which is hard seeming she is one of the easiest champs)_ and even if your AP scalings didn't outscale most other mages _(which they do)_, all you need to do is stand at a safe distance and fling your CC and AoE into fights and let your team clean up the mess. Literally everything she has is either AoE or hits multiple targets, you have to really TRY to miss her spells.

With regards to her passive, if we pretend a Lux is lvl 18 with 500 AP, her passive does 340 damage a pop _(which is almost 20% of an ADC's HP btw)_.
Even if you are half-decent with the champ, you'll proc your passive 3 times on the same target in a fight _(assuming they even last that long, which is a big assumption)_. so it gives you an extra 1040 damage to your combo. There aren't many mid laners _(or even champions in general)_ that get an extra 1040 burst damage from their _passive_. _(not to mention they synergise wayyyyy too well with sheen.)_
